Package it.polimi.ingsw.distributed.integrated

Class UtilitySerializer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.distributed.integrated.UtilitySerializer
public class UtilitySerializer extends Object
Class used to transform the game model components into primitive types for serialization
